column5: I read that ther are some new regs for the sothern region, about the minimum lenghth restrictions were lifted but a 14-28" slot was issued for lakes so of the gammon & bloodvein rivers and so. does any one know if Whitemouth Lk. is included in this slot limit ?? Thanks Ted
no the slot limit is under 15 or over 28on the east side of lake winnipeg south to the south end of whiteshell park. whitemouth does not fall in this area
